name: parish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in some Christian denominations, an area cared for by one priest with its own church, or (in England) the smallest unit of local government: the parish church/magazine/priest/register See also
parochial (OF A CHURCH)

Add to word list
Add to word list
an area that a church provides for: She lived her whole life in this parish.
A parish is also a political division within the state of Louisiana.
